price: Kuma dã lalle ne sũ, sun yi ĩmani, kuma sun yi taƙawa, haƙiƙa, da sakamako daga wurin Allah shi ne mafi alhẽri, dã sun kasance suna sani.
arabic: وَلَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ ءَامَنُواْ وَٱتَّقَوۡاْ لَمَثُوبَةٞ مِّنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞۚ لَّوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaw annahum āmanū wa-ittaqaw lamathūbatun min ʿindi al-lahi khayrun law kānū yaʿlamūna
